<Heading
  as={"h1"}

>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/staff/transactions/share/"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This endpoint retrieves transaction statistics grouped by method and month. It requires an admin token for access.

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"content":{"application/json":{"examples":{"success":{"value":{"statusCode":200,"message":"Transactions found","error":null,"result":{"method":{"volume":1000,"count":10,"percentage":0.5}},"total":{"volume":5000,"count":50},"byMonth":[{"_id":{"month":1,"year":2023},"volume":2000,"count":20,"paypal":1000,"stripe":500,"coingate":300,"cashfree":200,"litepay":0,"staffForcePay":0,"growth":{"volume":10,"count":5}}],"estimatedRevenues":1500}}}}}},"403":{"content":{"application/json":{"examples":{"forbidden":{"value":{"statusCode":403,"message":"Forbidden","error":"You are not allowed to access this resource"}}}}}},"500":{"content":{"application/json":{"examples":{"serverError":{"value":{"statusCode":500,"message":"Internal server error","error":"An unexpected error occurred"}}}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
